casebody.data:
Re: STATE
v.
Eddie CAPLE. No. 437A05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2007. Paul F. Herzog, Fayetteville, for Caple. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 650 S.E.2d 8.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of September 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of September 2007."
